CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 13, 1957, pg. A3, reads: "Scholarship Contestants - The Carter - Hayes School of Music, located on Frankstown Ave., recently held its annual scholarship recital. Contestants were, left to right: Cynthia McClellan, Joycene McElroy, Jo Ann Cobb, honorable mention, and Jerrolene Hinton, scholarship winner.  The judges were Dr. B. O. Holland, Montgomery C. Evans and Earsley Kincaid. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Contestants for music scholarship, from left: Cynthia McClellan, Joycene McElroy, Jo Ann Cobb, and winner Jerrolene Hinton, posed behind opened grand piano, in Hayes School of Music, East Liberty
